title: Understanding the Legal Context
text: Consider the legal status of peyote use in religious ceremonies within the United States. Are there any specific laws or exemptions that apply to certain groups?

title: Exploring Cultural Practices
text: Think about the cultural practices of the Native American Church. How do these practices relate to the use of peyote?

title: Legal Exemptions for Religious Practices
text: Research if there are any legal exemptions for the use of peyote in religious ceremonies by the Native American Church.
